tasks.task: Apply pesticide to crops using a sprayer.
subtasks: Assemble spraying equipment.
Load pesticide into sprayer.
Attach sprayer to vehicle.
Drive vehicle through the field.
Operate sprayer to distribute pesticide evenly.

tasks.task: Load hay into a hay wagon.
subtasks: Approach the field with the wagon.
Disengage the hitch on the wagon.
Manual lift of bales onto the wagon.
Stack hay bales on the wagon.
Secure hay bales to prevent shifting.

tasks.task: Attach a new drive belt to a combine harvester.
subtasks: Identify the broken belt.
Gather replacement belt and tools.
Refer to operator's manual for instructions.
Remove old belt tensioner.
Install new belt around pulleys.
Check tension and alignment of the belt.
Reinstall belt tensioner.
Test operation of the equipment.
Approach the milking parlor.
Position the cow for milking.
Clean the teats with disinfectant.
Apply teat dip after milking.
Attach suction cups to each teat.
Operate the milking machine.
Collect milk samples for quality check.
Clean equipment and area after milking.

tasks.task: Operate a manure spreader to fertilize fields.
subtasks: Fill spreader with manure from the pile.
Adjust spreader width and speed according to field size.
Drive spreader through the field.
Monitor distribution to ensure even coverage.
Distribute around the field edges, corners, and slopes.
Refill spreader as needed.
Measure and mark the perimeter of the pasture.
Cut posts and string wire or rope.
Drive stakes into the ground.
Attach wire or rope to top and bottom of posts.
Check tension and secure wire.
Apply electrification if needed.
Inspect and maintain fences regularly.

tasks.task: Evacuate livestock from a barn during fire drill.
subtasks: Check the fire alarm systems.
Announce emergency to the workers and animals.
Assist in herding livestock to the designated exit.
Ensure all animals are accounted for and safely outside.
Check the perimeter for any escaped animals.
Notify rescue services if needed.

tasks.task: Repair a broken irrigation pipe in a field.
subtasks: Locate the broken pipe and assess the damage.
Shut off water supply to the irrigation system.
Dig around the broken pipe to access it.
Replace or repair the broken pipe.
Realign broken sections if necessary.
Reconnect the pipe and restore water flow.
Check for leaks or further damage.

tasks.task: Cut wood logs into suitable lengths for animal bedding.
subtasks: Identify and select the appropriate logs.
Measure and mark the logs with desired lengths.
Use a chainsaw or handsaw to cut logs.
Stack the cut logs neatly for storage.

tasks.task: Disinfect poultry coop with a mister.
subtasks: Mix the disinfectant solution in a bucket.
Attach the mister to the poultry coop.
Apply the disinfectant to all surfaces.
Allow drying time as per instructions.
Evaluate for any missed spots and reapply if necessary.
Prepare the traps with bait.
Position traps along expected rabbit pathways.
Monitor traps regularly for catches.
Collect trapped rabbits and dispose of or relocate.
